org.pipservices.runtime.validation

Class Schema

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pipservices.runtime.validation.Schema

  • public class Schema
extends Object
    Represents a validation schema for complex objects.
    Since:
    2016-06-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergey Seroukhov

      Creates an instance of validation schema

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        public List<PropertySchema> getProperties()
        Gets a list of object properties
        Returns:
        a list of property validation schemas

      • getRules

        public List<IValidationRule> getRules()
        Gets a validation rules for entire object
        Returns:
        a list of validation rules

      • withProperty

        public Schema withProperty(String name,
                           String type,
                           IPropertyValidationRule... rules)
        Adds to the validation schema a required property defined by a simple type.
        Parameters:
        name - a name of the property to be added
        type - simple type that defines the property value
        rules - a set of validation rules for the property
        Returns:
        a self reference to the schema for chaining

      • withArray

        public Schema withArray(String name,
                        String type,
                        IPropertyValidationRule... rules)
        Adds to the validation schema a required property array defined by a simple type.
        Parameters:
        name - a name of the property to be added
        type - simple type that defines the property value
        required - a required flag
        rules - a set of validation rules for the property
        Returns:
        a self reference to the schema for chaining
